tossup_question: -   –  If star is a binary operation on a subset of the real numbers, for which of the following definitions is star commutative?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)a star b = a – b
X)a star b = a/b
Y)a star b = the fraction with numerator a + b and denominator a times b
Z)a star b = a^2 –b^2
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) a star b = THE FRACTION WITH NUMERATOR a + b AND DENOMINATOR a TIMES b
bonus_question: -   –  Consider the following two statements: 1) If A and B, then C; 2) Not C. Which of the following conclusions follows from these statements?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Not A and not B
X)Not A or not B
Y0If A, then C
Z)If not C, then not B
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) NOT A OR NOT B
